summary.span: 使用高级加密标准 (AES) 算法的加密应用程序编程接口 (CAPI) 实现来执行对称加密和解密。

span.span: Performs symmetric encryption and decryption using the Cryptographic Application Programming Interfaces (CAPI) implementation of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何进行加密和解密使用示例数据类。The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the class. summary.span: 获取或设置密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key.

value.span: 密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该密钥的最小大小是 128 位，并最大大小为 256 位。The minimum size of the key is 128 bits, and the maximum size is 256 bits. 更改`KeySize`值重置密钥，将生成一个新的随机密钥。Changing the `KeySize` value resets the key and generates a new random key. 发生这种情况时`KeySize`属性 setter 调用 （包括其已分配相同的值时）。This happens whenever the `KeySize` property setter is invoked (including when it's assigned the same value).
